name: @asu-etx/ring-leader
description: Â©, 2020 Arizona State University ETX. Libraries to support LTI 1.3 enabled tools
author: Melanie.Narish@asu.edu

scripts.start: yarn install && cd packages/rl-shared && yarn run build && cd ../rl-client-lib && yarn run build && cd ../rl-server-lib && yarn run build && cd ../rl-tool-example-client && yarn run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others "yarn run watch-client-lib" "yarn run watch-server-lib" "yarn run watch-shared"
